short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dan's own homemade ad blocker for Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dan's ad blocker is a true ad blocker - no mischief, and no backdoor deals to let some ads through.  I personally maintain a blacklist of advertising domains and block all of them.  This extension is very lightweight because it does only what it says it does - block ads.  I will update the blacklist as frequently as possible, but keep in mind that this is a free extension - I'm not getting paid to maintain it.
